content.rendered:
Directed by B. Unnikrishnan

Written by Udaykrishnan

Star Mohanlal (Neyyattinkara Gopan). Nedumudi Venu (Sreedharan Master). Vijayaraghavan (Edathala Mathai). Siddique (CI Sivasankaran). Saikumar (Sathyasheelan). Ganesh Kumar (NIA Officer). Johny Antony (Adv. Vettickal Sasi). Indrans (Tabalist Balan). Kochu Preman (Panchayat Opposition Leader). Nandu (Narayana Pillai). Ravikumar (Raghavan). Seetha (Janaki). Shraddha Srinath (RDO Anjali). Alexander Prasanth (Thankachan). V.K. Sriraman (TV Show Anchor). Rachana Narayanankutty (Rugmini). Riyaz Khan (Damodaran). Santhosh Keezhattoor (SP Ramdas IPS). Ramachandra Raju (Bada Raju). Prabhakar (Durga Reddy). Sreejith Ravi (SI Vishwambharan). Swasika Vijay (Balan’s Daughter). Kottayam Ramesh (Kumarji). Lukman Lukku (Mansoor). Neha Saxena (Swapna). Biju Pappan (Edathala Baby). Ashwin Kumar (Ayyappan). Pradeep Kottayam (Temple Priest). Shivaji Guruvayoor (Revenue Minister Rajendran). Rony David (Edathala Babu). Sadhika Venugopal (Sushama). Baiju Ezhupunna (Rambo). Gaadha (Subhadra). Malavika Menon (Balan’s Daughter). Meera Nair (Julie). Anjali Nair (District Collector). Tanvi Ram (Commissioner’s Daughter). Maya Vishwanath (Deepa). Dhruvan (Sreedharan Master’s Son). Anarkali Nazar (Sreedharan Master’s Daughter-in-law). Ramu (DGP). Sharik Khan (Sameer). Nandu Poduval (Revenue Minister’s PA). Biju Menon (Colonel Suryachandra Lal). Antony Perumbavoor (Self). A.R. Rahman (Self). Drums Shivamani (Self). Kalamandalam Gopi (Self)

Language Malayalam

Producers B. Unnikrishnan

Production Hippo Prime Motion Pictures. MPM Group. RD Illuminations
